channel.title: Projects on Parth Rangarajan
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Parth Rangarajan

item.title: Project I: Horizon
item.description: A text summarizing Web-App using SpaCy, Sumy, NLTk and Gensim. Using these libraries, Horizon summarizes your text, helping you to understand the passage better. But you may ask, where will this ever be used? Imagine you have a 100 page long pdf to read for just some important points. Well, Horizon will give you an apt summary of that part thereby giving you a complete idea of what that passage is about.

item.title: Project II: Multimodal Style Transfer
item.description: Multimodal Style Transfer is a hierarchical Deep Convolutional Nueral Network for Fast Artistic Style Transfer. This is applied by using Graph Cuts. It is based on the assumption that images styles can be described by the deep features present in them. Images are scraped using DuckDuckGo and the scraper is applied on GettyImages. Then a style is chosen from images that are also scraped based on a text prompt given by the user.
